title: THEA 430
intro: Introduces the students to various aspects of working on a production at Krannert Center and to the resources available to them. The remainder of the semester will focus on the foundations of theatrical technical design and the production process typical of a professional regional theatre. Students will put this knowledge to practical use by working through necessary steps for theoretical productions, from beginning to end during the second half of the semester. In addition, there will be discussions on topics related to the other duties and responsibilities of a Technical Director.
